content:

thought: To craft a spruce_door, I need to craft 3 spruce_planks. The only way to do so is to craft them from stripped_spruce_log, which is at slot 36. I will therefore move it to the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 1 with quantity 1
